nom: Algerian Deglet Noor dates covered with Belgium dark chocolat
ingredient:
Stuffed with 6 diffrent fillings : Almond & lemon cream, Hazelnut butter,
 Pistachios butter,
 Dark chocolat & orange blossom ganache,
 Peanuts butter & fleur de sel,
 Walnuts and coconut cream with cardamom.
freeof: Added sugar Gluten & lactose Artificial flavors
facts: Serving size : 100 g ( around 13 dates ), Calories  = 480 kcal, Carbs 83g, Dietary fiber 8g, Fat 16g, Protein 5g
